short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FocusFlow is a minimalist Pomodoro timer to keep you productive with live countdowns directly on your toolbar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FocusFlow is a simple and elegant Pomodoro timer extension designed to help you stay focused and productive. It provides an intuitive interface directly in your browser toolbar, allowing you to track work and break intervals efficiently. With just a click, you can start, pause, and reset the timer, keeping you on track for your productivity goals. FocusFlow is perfect for those who want to use the Pomodoro technique to improve their time management and boost their focus.
